title: Web Developer (ColdFusion Focus) - Hybrid Remote
job_description:
Job Title: Web Developer (ColdFusion Focus)
Location: Hybrid Remote - Bethesda, MD
Company: Leading Web Solutions Provider for Associations and Nonprofits
Compensation: $49-$59/hr + comprehensive benefits (PTO, health insurance, hybrid schedule)
You must live within the greater Washington, DC area
No sponsorship offered.
About Us
We are a long-established web development firm with over three decades of experience serving associations and nonprofit organizations. Located in Bethesda, MD, we specialize in building and supporting custom websites and web applications using proven technologies. Our work is rooted in a consultative, collaborative approach designed to deliver long-term value to our clients.
Position Overview
We're looking for a skilled Web Developer with solid experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript (including jQuery), and ColdFusion. This is a mid-level position ideal for someone who understands how websites are built and function end-to-end. The ideal candidate will be hands-on with both front-end and server-side development and able to support the ongoing creation and maintenance of multiple client sites.
This is not a modern JavaScript framework environment-React, Node, Vue, etc. are not used. Instead, we value developers who can work within traditional web stacks and bring strong practical knowledge of full-site development using ColdFusion and SQL databases.
Key Responsibilities
Build, maintain, and enhance websites using ColdFusion, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript/jQuery
Collaborate with internal teams to manage content updates, site enhancements, and new builds
Use SQL (primarily MS-SQL) to manage and integrate data-driven components
Ensure consistent performance, security, and maintainability across client projects
Troubleshoot bugs and handle debugging on both the client and server side
Maintain version control using CVS or SVN
Contribute to technical documentation and codebase organization
Required Skills
Strong experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery
Professional experience with ColdFusion for server-side processing
Understanding of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) and MVC concepts
Experience working with MS-SQL (T-SQL)
Familiarity with version control systems (CVS or SVN)
Ability to manage and maintain multiple active websites simultaneously
Solid troubleshooting skills and attention to detail
A Plus to Have
Experience working with WordPress
Familiarity with the Bootstrap framework
Exposure to Mura CMS
Knowledge of IIS Web Server
Experience supporting nonprofit or association clients
What We Offer
Hybrid work environment with a flexible schedule
A collaborative and supportive team culture
Long-term client relationships and consistent project pipeline
Competitive compensation and benefits package
Opportunity to grow within a stable, respected firm
RECOMMENDED SKILLS
Attention To Detail Cvs Iis J Query Java Script (Programming Language) Mvc

title: SAP Hybris Developer
job_description:
Our client, a leading technology solutions provider, is seeking a SAP Hybris Developer to join their team. As a SAP Hybris Developer, you will be part of the development team supporting innovative projects. The ideal candidate will have strong leadership skills, excellent problem-solving abilities, and exceptional communication skills which will align successfully in the organization.
Job Title: SAP Hybris Developer
Location: Milwaukee, WI - REMOTE
What's the Job?
Manage and develop solutions using SAP Hybris / SAP Commerce Cloud.
Lead development teams and mentor junior developers to enhance their skills.
Implement and maintain various Hybris modules including PCM, WCMS, and Order Management.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless SAP integrations.
Utilize tools like Jenkins, Git, JIRA, and Confluence for project management and version control.
What's Needed?
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
8+ years of hands-on experience with SAP Hybris / SAP Commerce Cloud.
Strong knowledge of Java, Spring Framework, and RESTful APIs.
Experience with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is a plus.
Proven experience in data modeling, performance tuning, and system architecture.
What's in it for me?
Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technology projects.
Collaborative and inclusive work environment.
Professional growth and development opportunities.
Chance to lead and mentor a talented team of developers.
Engagement in innovative solutions that impact the business.

Medical and Prescription Drug Plans
Dental Plan
Vision Plan
Health Savings Account
Health Flexible Spending Account
Dependent Care Flexible Spending Account

401(k), Plus Match
Weekly Pay

job_description:
